//www.miniclip.com/games/sketchfulio?utm_source=miniclipFeed&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=Feed%3A+Sketchful.io&utm_content=RSS+Feed
//www.miniclip.com/games/sketchfulio?utm_source=miniclipFeed&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=Feed%3A+Sketchful.io&utm_content=RSS+Feed
Games
Sketchful.io
Sketchful.io is an online drawing and guessing game. In Sketchful.io you'll be playing in real-time against other players from around the world. In this game, you will take turns as the artist and the guesser. The artist secretly receives a word and has to draw it. The guessers have to guess what the word is by looking a the picture. Points are awarded to the person who guesses right and first. You might recognize this as extremely similar to the popular tabletop game known as Pictionary. But the idea of guessing what other players are drawing goes back far, far longer than that. Besides, in this version, there is a public leaderboard and a variety of players from around the world who will bring an international flavor to the game. You'll be using your mouse to draw the picture and will have access to a variety of different colors, brushes, brush sizes, and interesting tools that let you fill the entire background or a specific enclosed area with paint. The players who are guessing will have to type their answers into the group chat. The chat bot will automatically detect the correct answer, end the turn and award the correct player with points. Test out your guessing skills and your drawing skills in this update on a classic game.
Miniclip on Facebook
|
Miniclip on Twitter

8 Ball Pool
8 Ball Pool is the biggest & best multiplayer Pool game online! Play billiards for FREE against other players & friends in 1-on-1 matches, enter tournaments to win big! Level up and earn Pool Coins for your wins. Customize with cues & cloths in the Pool Shop. Also available for FREE on iPhone, iPad, iTouch & Android devices.
New player? See our
Starter Guide
!

//www.miniclip.com/games/yorgio-3?utm_source=miniclipFeed&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=Feed%3A+Yorg.io+3&utm_content=RSS+Feed
//www.miniclip.com/games/yorgio-3?utm_source=miniclipFeed&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=Feed%3A+Yorg.io+3&utm_content=RSS+Feed
Games
Yorg.io 3
YORG.io 3 is an online strategy game about managing supply chains and defending your base against zombies which spawn at night. During the day you gather resources and build factories as well as towers to survive the night. Try to survive as long as possible in the singleplayer, or defend your opponents in the brand new multiplayer! Manage your supply chains and build up a network of miners and factories to provide ammunition for your towers. Research new technologies to unlock super cool upgrades, and if that wouldn't be enough, there are now also ranked games - climb up the ladder to eventually reach the legendary master division!
YORG.io 3 is the sequel of the popular .io game YORG.io and includes new content, maps, multiplayer, skins and a lot more! Can you beat your friends!?
Miniclip on Facebook
|
Miniclip on Twitter
